content: **crochet blanket in 2 colorways made with 2 strands of alpaca** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** approx 65 x 80 cm **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio rose blanket 150 g colour no 0100 off white 100 g colour no 3140 light rose 50 g colour no 3720 old rose 50 g colour no 0302 camel blue blanket 150 g colour no 0100 off white 100 g colour no 8105 light greyblue 50 g colour no 6205 light blue 50 g colour no 0302 camel drops crochet hook size 5 mm **pattern links ** french version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=24 also available at https //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=2212&cid=8
